StepData.description: Welcome to the island! This region, also known as the Stone Plains, will act as our initial Habitat to help train your Chimeras and restore the land.
Much of the world has been ruined during the Calamity but that has long since passed.
Nonetheless, the negative effects of that disaster continue to harm the region.
We can start restoring the land and gathering resources by sending your Chimera out on an Expedition.
Well at the moment that's just me, but I'll do my best!
Let's click on the portal to get started!
Here we can see all of our available Expeditions and their properties.
We currently only have access to one Expedition, but don't worry I know we'll unlock more with a little hard work!
Let's select one to get started.
On the left side, you can add Chimeras to your Expedition Party. Up to 3 Chimera can go on a single Expedition.
More powerful Chimeras will typically offer a higher success chance.
Using Chimeras with recommended traits will provide a significant bonus so be sure to pay attention to what the Expedition is looking for!
Reccomended traits include the Fire, Water, and Grass elements and the Exploration, Stamina, and Wisdom stats.
All Chimeras in your Expedition Party will lose some energy but that will restore on its own with enough time.
Once your Expedition Party is ready, click the Confirm button and see if your expedition is a success!
Great job you just unlocked your first facility!
This Facility can be used to train a Chimera in a specific attribute and level it up so that it will be ready to go on Expeditions.
To train a chimera, click and drag it over the highlighted area. Releasing a chimera over this area will start its training.
Choose how much you want to level your chimera’s attribute up and click the confirm button so you can get it trained up!
Oh wow! It looks like your Chimera brought back some fossils from its Expedition. These can be used to create new Chimeras.
On the right side of the world you’ve just gained the Hatchery
There you can spend fossils gathered on missions to create new Chimeras.
Why don’t you buy some and get training? The stronger our team is, the more successful we will be on future Expeditions.
Nice! It looks like your Chimera brought was able to upgrade your habitat.
You’ve actually helped us to heal a bit of our world. Thank you!
Now that the habitat is upgraded you can now click on facilities to enter their upgrade menu.
Upgraded facilities require less essence to level up and train your chimeras faster
Hope you like 'em!
